mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.BLD_CD , A.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ A /*월조직내역*/ WHERE 1=1

SELECT CLING_COST_ADJ_RCP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FST_RGST_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS FST_RGST_DTM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_MDFC_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , CLING_COST_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_BASE', 'CLING_COST_DV_CD', CLING_COST_DV_CD) AS CLING_COST_DV_NM , BLD_CD , (SELECT S1.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS S1 WHERE S1.BLD_CD = T1.BLD_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BLD_NM , CLAIM_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APLC_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APLC_DT , BIL_AMT , CLING_COST_SRCP_APN_FILE_ID ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = T1.CLING_COST_SRCP_APN_FILE_ID) AS ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES FROM TB_CBCL_CLING_COST_ADJ_IZ T1 WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(APLC_DT, 1, 6) BETWEEN #{aplcStartDt} AND #{aplcEndDt} AND CLING_COST_DV_CD IN ('02')
AND BLD_CD IN (SELECT A.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ A /*월조직내역*/ WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_NM LIKE '%'||#{bldNm}||'%' AND A.BASE_YM BETWEEN #{aplcStartDt} AND #{aplcEndDt} )
AND T1.CLAIM_NM = #{session.userName}
AND T1.CLAIM_NM IN (SELECT S1.HOO_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BIZ_SPPT_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND S1.BASE_YM BETWEEN #{aplcStartDt} AND #{aplcEndDt} )
ORDER BY T1.APLC_DT DESC, T1.FST_RGST_DTM DESC
